name: Milky Way Mail
description:
"Write a letter to them, and then don't send it."

"Write it down, and don't let anyone read it."

"Write it down and burn it."

When you write a letter to no one, who reads it?

When you shout into the void, who hears it?

When you cry out to be heard, who answers?

Milky Way Mail is a short, peaceful, contemplative journey through space, collecting letters sent by those in need to the universe, expecting no one to read them. Follow the letters of these four individuals as they express themselves and use their letters to slowly heal themselves.
